with a playstation image file, you can normally only play it with an emulator. if you want to actually play it on your playstation, you need to mod it, so just google "playstation mods" and find one, normally a chip to be soldered into your playstation for around $10, and you can play these on your playstation, just burn them with any software.

Hey, this torrent is sick--loving the classic stuff.  I never got a chance to play it back in the day.  One question--I can't seem to get the ffVII one working with ePSXe.  It opens and runs, and I can get through the opening cinematic, but once I enter a battle I can't see the menu.  The bottom quarter of the screen is black, with a little blue rectangle where (I think) the ATB bar should be.  I can still hear noises when I hit up or down, and can still select things, and battle works as normal, but I can't see it.  Any tips on which video plugin to switch to, or some similar fix?  I'd just try them all except testing one involves waiting through the whole opening FMV.
